page.title: 19TOURISM IN CALLANDER
page.content: {Accommodation:}Facilities for the tourist in this area are many and varied and the information buraeu will find accommodation in any of the 921 rooms available to suit any requirements.People can choose to stay in hotels,guest houses,chalets,caravan and bed and breakfast establishments. The hotels vary from the prestigious Roman Camp Hotel (a former hunting lodge)to the small family business. Many of the larger hotels cater for bus tours.There are two caravan parks and two chalet parks nearby. {Eating Places:}During the season there is a great variety of maels available. As well as hotels and guest houses there are inns,restaurants,cafes,take away hot food shops and ice cream bars. For the size of town there is an excessive number of licensed premises.
